name: Oregon Trail Alien World
description:
Westward expansion -- but in an unfamiliar world.

We're long past "TYPE BANG" it appears... What may have started out as something familiar has ended up in a place of perpetual night and under assault by macro-viruses bent on ending your journey west. They want your health.  You want to weaken the infection enough so you can carry on.  Mysteries and strange things abound -- and not everything is always at it appears (or sounds...).

Notes to Player:

  • Use full screen mode for full game screen and effect.
  • You may have to mouse click once inside the game to activate all keyboard features.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD keys - Navigate the playing field (step forward, left, back, right)
  • Mouse movements - Turn and look (left, right, up and down - aim)
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire projectile
  • Right Mouse Button - Swing sword
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • ESC ESC (two key presses) - End game now (bail out)
